title: The meaning of seeing urine in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Urine in a dream is an unconventional and strange vision that makes its owner feel upset, although many of its interpretations deserve praise and good news for its owner. Many of the imams’ interpreters spoke about this dream and mentioned different connotations about it, and this varies with the difference in the social status of the visions, details, and events that he sees. This person in the dream. Urine in a dream. Seeing urine in a poor man’s dream symbolizes improving his affairs and living with enough money. Seeing the urine of a rich person in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates that you are spending a lot of money in the wrong place. Seeing urine retention in a dream indicates The dreamer is stingy in paying zakat and charity, and God knows best. The dream of urinating in the sea symbolizes the dreamer coming to commit some undesirable actions. Ura in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing urine in a dream symbolizes the illegal and forbidden acquisition of money. To dream of a person urinating on another person In a dream, it symbolizes entering into a marriage relationship. Seeing urine in a dream symbolizes excessive spending of money on useless things. If a fortuneteller sees in a dream that he is urinating on food, it is evidence of his bad morals, and that in reality he is an ungrateful and corrupt person. To dream that you are urinating in a drink in a dream symbolizes poverty and distress. Urine in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a virgin girl urinating in her dream indicates that she feels comfortable and reassured during this time and is a sign that indicates the end of trials and tribulations. The dreamer who sees that she is holding urine in a dream is an indication of She is living in a state of turmoil and has some fears about her life. Seeing a lot of urine in a newborn girl’s dream symbolizes paying a lot of money to complete the engagement or her marriage. Dreaming that he is urinating in an unknown place in a dream indicates that the dreamer will get married soon, God willing. The dream For a single girl to urinate on herself in a vision indicates her fear of scandal or her fear of revealing some things that she hides from others. When an unmarried girl sees that she is urinating on her clothes, this is an indication of the visionary’s effort to achieve something, and it will come true soon. Seeing a virgin girl urinating on the ground in a dream indicates excessiveness and is a sign that leads to identifying some evil people, and the discerning person must pay attention to those around her. To dream that you are urinating in a dream symbolizes a feeling of comfort, survival, and security. What is the interpretation of seeing blood urinating in a single woman’s dream? Seeing an unmarried woman urinating blood in her dream and feeling comfortable after that means getting rid of some of the judgments and obstacles she was exposed to. Seeing a girl urinating blood in a dream indicates the beginning of a new phase in her life full of good changes. To dream that you are urinating blood in a dream for a virgin girl symbolizes... To fall into some difficulties and problems that are difficult to get rid of. A wise woman who sees in her dream that she is urinating blood is one of the dreams that symbolizes the illegal acquisition of money. Seeing a virgin urinating blood in a dream means following a path

title: Interpretation of broken glass in a dream: Seeing broken glass in a dream

preview.html: The dream of broken glass indicates deceptive interpretations and other interpretations. We will interpret it for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, such as seeing broken glass or breaking glass in the house. Interpretation of broken glass in a dream Broken glass in a dream indicates that hypocrites will be exposed, that is, you will discover that someone is acting hypocritically towards you, and breaking glass in a dream shows arrogance in oneself and money, friendship with fools, and one's meetings with them. Whoever sees that he has a cup in his hand and it falls on him and breaks on him, he divorces his wife, and if he does not have a wife, one of his relatives will die, and breaking glass and breaking crystal in a dream symbolizes problems and competition between spouses, relatives, or even brothers. Anyone who dreams of breaking a window, door, or mirror lives in a state of psychological turmoil and discomfort, and the dream is an expression in the subconscious of the dreamer's inability to overcome his problems, which are often financial. Seeing glass in a dream means success, luck, and improving conditions, if the glass in the dream is intact. As for broken or broken glass in a dream, it portends failure and deterioration of living or health conditions. Breaking glass indicates sudden separation or death if its breaking is unintentional in a dream, it indicates weakness in work or hypocrisy, arrogance, and diving into people's affairs if it is deliberate, and in some cases it indicates Breaking it to remove sadness and grief. Or comfort.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood.com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');When a man or woman sees that there is a broken piece of glass in his dream, it reveals to those around him a hypocrite or a deceiver, and if the glass was in his hand and fell from him, then it is also. About the separation of a man or the divorce of his wife, and if he is not married, it is the death of a woman from his relatives, and if he deliberately breaks the piece from his hand, this is an evil act that he does. Regret. As for seeing the windows of the house, car or kitchen smashed or broken, it indicates the person's condition, as it is between two things, as the commentators said for men and women. Especially if he breaks the glass by hand or deliberately using any tool. As for the one who collects broken and broken glass from the ground, this indicates his friendship and closeness with the fools and hypocrites around him or that he collects money from a forbidden source, and often the glass collector from the ground in his dream is a person who is arrogant and conceited in himself to the point that it is not worth a part of what he actually does. atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? title: The interpretation of sucking a man’s penis in a dream is a vision of sucking a man’s penis in a dream

preview.html: A dream about sucking a penis indicates goodness and fulfillment of desires. Other interpretations that we will interpret for a girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a man, such as sucking a woman’s vagina, sucking a husband’s penis, or drinking semen from a long, big, short, white or black penis, or dreaming that I was drinking From Ibn Sirin that I breastfeed and more in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of sucking a penis in a dream A dream about sucking a penis is beneficial for a breastfeeding mother and for achieving goodness and fulfilling a need. And the breastfeeding woman, and there is no good in it for the breastfeeding woman except what was mentioned. Sucking the penis could foretell an affliction that will harm the fortuneteller, and that the man will be a part of it or aid in its appearance. Whoever sees that he is breastfeeding a man’s penis, he will have a vagina, a little money, and an unemployed man, and a woman’s vagina, if the man treats him with something other than a male. It is a vagina for those who lack it. Weak. Seeing a woman playing with a man’s penis means an intimate relationship with her soon. Seeing a man playing with a man’s penis indicates extreme fear that afflicts the one playing. Seeing you holding the penis indicates that you will be able to get it. The value of money is equal to your position. And if one sees in a dream that he is breastfeeding milk from His mother, in real life he is influenced by others, so he lives according to the desire of others and not according to his desire. If the dreamer drinks milk from someone else, this indicates the person’s connection with others in material matters, and in terms of religious interpretation, it indicates the sustenance of insight, and that he is far from the forbidden. Seeing yourself sucking an animal’s penis in a dream indicates that the dreamer has committed a great sin, and instead of learning from his mistakes, he is walking on the forbidden path. title: Interpretation of a dream about breakfast in the Haram

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about breaking the fast at a shrine in a dream: You can find out what was mentioned in the books of scholars about the interpretation of a dream about breaking a fast at a shrine in a dream and whether it was good or bad. All this and more details that interest you.Interpretation of a dream about breakfast in the Holy Mosque in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about breakfast in the Shrine in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations of his vision. If a young man sees food inside the Grand Mosque in Mecca, he may show kindness and blessing, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl is seen eating in The Sanctuary, this indicates useful knowledge, and God knows best. Seeing a married man eating in the temple can be evidence of useful knowledge, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about the call to prayer in the Holy Mosque in Mecca in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the call to prayer in the Holy Mosque in Mecca in a dream may indicate an invitation to Hajj or Umrah, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married man sees the call to prayer in the Haram, it can be transformed into a call to Hajj or Umrah, and God knows the unseen. Seeing and hearing the call to prayer can also express the attainment of strength and power, and God knows the unseen. If a single girl is seen listening to the call to prayer, she may call people or Hajj, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams about praying in the courtyard of the shrine in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about praying in the courtyard of the shrine in a dream. Seeing prayer in the shrine can indicate religiosity and faith, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees praying in the shrine, this may lead to goodness, and God knows best. Seeing prayer in the shrine is also evidence of goodness. And happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about an empty shrine in a dream. A dream interpretation of an empty shrine in a dream can indicate distance from God and that God has knowledge of the unseen. When the dreamer sees the holy emptiness, it may lead to his preoccupation with the world, and God knows best. If a young man sees the holy shrine empty, it may lead to weakness and distance from God, and God knows. The UnseenIf an unmarried girl sees the Holy Mosque empty, it may represent committing sins, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about praying in the Holy Mosque in Mecca in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about praying in the Holy Mosque in Mecca in a dream could refer to worship, and God knows the unseen. In the event that the dreamer sees praying in the Holy Mosque, it may be a reference to Satisfying desires, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing supplications in the shrine can express freedom from distress, and God knows best. And if the dreamer sees prayer in the Meccan Mosque and cries, this may be evidence of relief, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about losing the Meccan Mosque in a dream could be the interpretation of the dream that he lost it in the Mecca. Mecca in a dream is evidence of deception from the truth, as it expresses contempt for the truth, and God knows best. Getting lost in the Meccan Mosque can also express distance from God, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself lost in the Meccan Mosque, this may be a sign of negligence in worship, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream A fire in the Grand Mosque in Mecca in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a fire in the Grand Mosque in Mecca in a dream. It could be one of the things that does not bode well, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a fire in the Grand Mosque in Mecca, it may lead the dreamer to temptation, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of a jeweler in a dream: Seeing a jeweler in a dream

preview.html: To dream of a goldsmith indicates malice, deceit and other interpretations. We translate it for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, for a man who tends to see a jeweler or enter a gold shop in the market, to buy or sell a necklace, a ring or a gold necklace for Ibn Sirin and others in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of the goldsmith and the crafting of gold and jewelry in a dream It is possible that the goldsmith in a dream embodies an evil and lying person in whom there is no good, or that in a dream he is also the person who extracts something from something else. In the same context, seeing a goldsmith in a dream means lies and deceit, or it may even refer to the systems of constructing poetry and speech. Moreover, seeing a goldsmith indicates knowledge, marriage and joys, and usually a goldsmith in a dream represents a bad person with no good in him. Seeing an unknown jeweler is one who lies and fabricates stories. If a goldsmith sees in a dream that he is mounting gold and silver jewelry, he is a person composed of people with something that begins with evil and ends with good. Gold in a dream, as in reality, is a treasure for the one who sees it and success in a task she performs. Seeing gold in a dream for a married woman means that she will soon become pregnant. If you see yourself wearing gold, especially a gold bracelet, this symbolizes that you will inherit a large inheritance. Some interpretations say that wearing gold in a dream indicates your marriage if you are single, or the marriage of your daughter or one of your beloved relatives to a man with good and distinguished qualities. The gold cover in a dream symbolizes the fear and restrictions that you will feel regarding a certain matter. Interpretations say that seeing a man in a dream wearing a gold necklace is a good omen, but seeing him wearing other gold is a bad omen. If a girl dreams that she is wearing a gold crown, this symbolizes that she will marry a man of high status in society. Interpretation of the goldsmith in a dream by Ibn Sirin If you see a goldsmith in your dream, this indicates that the dreamer lives on marriage and children, and this dream indicates a feeling of security and safety throughout his life. The interpretation of this dream can be completely negative if the dreamer sees the goldsmith while making jewelry, as this indicates that he has gone through bad events such as forgery or deception. The interpretation of seeing the goldsmith in a dream may be an indication of achieving certain achievements from a scientific point of view, such as the author of the dream writing a collection of poetry or a literary book, and achieving great success and great fame. The interpretation of the vision can also have the meaning of trying Recovery from diseases, and it can refer to lies, forgery and manipulation. Among these negative interpretations of seeing a goldsmith in a dream, one of the positive interpretations can come from it, as it can indicate that the owner of the dream will be able to overcome the problems he suffered from, and it also indicates the beginning of a new stage in the dreamer's life. atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol =

If a girl dreams that she is wearing a gold crown, this symbolizes that she will marry a man of high status in society. Interpretation of the goldsmith in a dream by Ibn Sirin If you see a goldsmith in your dream, this indicates that the dreamer lives on marriage and children, and this dream indicates a feeling of security and safety throughout his life. The interpretation of this dream can be completely negative if the dreamer sees the goldsmith while making jewelry, as this indicates that he has gone through bad events such as forgery or deception. The interpretation of seeing the goldsmith in a dream may be an indication of achieving certain achievements from a scientific point of view, such as the author of the dream writing a collection of poetry or a literary book, and achieving great success and great fame. The interpretation of the vision can also have the meaning of trying Recovery from diseases, and it can refer to lies, forgery and manipulation. Among these negative interpretations of seeing a goldsmith in a dream, one of the positive interpretations can come from it, as it can indicate that the owner of the dream will be able to overcome the problems he suffered from, and it also indicates the beginning of a new stage in the dreamer's life. atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol =

preview.html: A dream about fighting shows goodness, reconciliation, and other interpretations. We will interpret it for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, for a man, such as hostility and disagreements with a person. The closeness of the family, the husband, the lover, the father, the mother, or the deceased, according to Ibn Sirin and others in the continuation of the topic: Interpretation of disagreement in a dream. Some psychologists say that seeing disagreements, rivalries, and quarrels with someone in a dream results from the discharge of negative energy. Hidden within the viewer is the result of a situation or event that happened to them in reality, and that person was not capable of. Empty or doing whatever he wants in reality to empty that energy or desire during his dream. Seeing a married woman in a quarrel, quarrel, or quarrel with some of those close to her or even with some family members or even with her husband’s family. You explain that this is not a vision, but it may be self-talk. Seeing a quarrel with a friend in general is a very beautiful vision in the sense that it shows kindness and shows interest in the continuation of this relationship between you and friends. As for seeing a quarrel with a relative or friend, and there was a disagreement in In fact, this vision here indicates reconciliation. Seeing a fight with strangers until the fight reaches a hand-to-hand struggle, and there may be, for example, some sharp tools, and this vision shows imprisonment, and with great regret. As for seeing rivalry and fighting with a familiar dead person, this vision has two meanings. : Either the dead person you know is dissatisfied with you, that is, there is dissatisfaction with this dead person over some of your actions. It has been said that this vision indicates the presence of some crises and problems for you. Seeing strife and violent conflict in the vision, and this violent battle with a dead person was a praiseworthy vision that indicates good things to come, God willing. title: Interpretation of a dream about a white beard in a dream and the whiteness of the beard

preview.html: Seeing a white beard in a dream indicates longevity and other interpretations. We will interpret it for the unmarried, for the married, for the pregnant woman, for the divorced woman, for the man, as a dream that his hair and beard have become white, or shaving the white beard of a bearded man, or the presence of gray hair on the chin according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq and others. Interpretation of a white beard in a dream: Seeing a white beard in a dream shows the extent of your connection with people close to you, how comfortable you are in life, and how satisfied you are with your appearance. To dream that your beard has turned white means that you will learn the steps of a new project, a new process, or a new stage. In your life. The color of a beard turning white in a dream means that you will go on a journey to discover something or start a new business project. Dreaming of a white beard indicates the end of a project, relationship, or situation and the beginning of a new project. This vision also shows that the dreamer needs to add more colors and joy to his life, because he lives in a boring routine. A white beard in a dream shows how much you believe in religion and this vision indicates that you are hiding something or avoiding the truth. Seeing someone with a white beard in a dream It means that you have reached an increased level of understanding, new awareness and a new perspective. This dream also indicates discussing and accepting your ideas, but at the same time it shows that you need more discipline in your life and make specific plans in your life and not live randomly.atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe' , 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? 's' : '') + '://tinyplywood. com/472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d/invoke.js"></scr' + 'ipt>');White beard hair in your dream represents liberation or exposure to some stress and pressure. This vision also suggests that the project you are working on may not be sustainable and all the energy you put into this project may not be worthwhile. Maintaining a white beard in a dream means that you are very demanding when giving your advice to others and trying to find someone and working to impose your opinions on them . Your dream also shows your worries about a problem and shows your desires to have children. A girl who sees someone with a white beard in a dream means that she is involved in some matter from the past, so this dream tells her that she should let go of the past and take care of the present and the future. atOptions = { 'key' : ' 472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ?
